thread.title: Nagarjuna and Naga Chaitanya to do a cameo in Akhil
thread.title_full: Nagarjuna and Naga Chaitanya to do a cameo in Akhil - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Nagarjuna and Naga Chaitanya to do a cameo in Akhil
text: The entire focus of the industry has shifted towards 'Akhil'. The film is in the last leg of its shoot and according to sources, both Nagarjuna and Naga Chaitanya will make a special appearance in the film. Sources close to us reveal that the father son duo will be seen in Akhil's introduction song which is currently being canned in Annapurna studios. Akhil has become a well known face all over India after his much popular TV commercial Ad's. With the release date closing in, promotions are on full swing and producer Nithin is leaving no stone unturned to make this film a huge hit. Sayesha Saigal is cast as the female lead and V V Vinayak is the director.
